articles.author: Sounak Mukhopadhyay
articles.title: MS Dhoni’s new look, hairstyle set the Internet on fire; check recent pic of ‘Perfect Hollywood Hero’ | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Hairstylist Aalim Hakim, who styled MS Dhoni, shared the photos online.
articles.content:
Mahendra Singh Dhoni has a new haircut, and it has set the Internet on fire. As soon as hairstylist Aalim Hakim - who styled MSD - shared photos, netizens started reacting to it.
 Really enjoyed cre… [+2086 chars]
